review: We do not have cable and with the stick we are able to enjoy movies, without paying the high cost of cable.
author: Anne

review: The Fire TV Stick truly works better than Apple TV, Google Chrome, or any preloaded Blu Ray/DVD Player I've used. The Speed and Transfer rates give better consistency with apps like Netflix and HBO GO, and the streaming music choices suit our families tastes.
author: Jonathan De Carlo

review: Only really works with prime  all additional apps freeze up and laggy
author: Chris casey

review: My dad suggested that I get this fire stick because I wanted to stream Netflix. It works Amazing! I even like the little remote!
author: Misty Meegan

review: I've used the Chromecast for a few months but after using the Fire TV Stick for a day, the Chromecast went in the garbage! This is an amazing product and I couldn't be happier with.
author: M. Porter "spikep"

review: Allows me to get all of the content from Amazon, Hulu, Netflix, Slingbox and many more. Easy installation.
author: Cathy W.

review: My family bought 4 for each room and we could not be happier...easy set up and so easy to use that my 5 year nephew can find his shows...advise though that you buy Netflix and/or Hulu, or else you have to pay
author: blunttruths

review: Love my fire stick TV.  Easy set up,just plug in and go.  Now I watch all my Amazon prime movies, etc on large screen and also, can view my photos on big screen.  Great investment
author: GC

review: Works perfectly for my Westinghouse 1080p in my bedroom. Now I can enjoy my Amazon Prime videos in bed.
author: Graniz7
